user.notes: Esto es una nota de prueba

plans.name: Plan de Julio Gutierrez Morales
plans.sessions: [{"name":"Sesión 1","items":[{"id":"Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_ejI1Nlsul9k","name_es":"Press de Banca con Barra (Barbell Bench Press)","name_en":"Barbell Bench Press","aliases":{},"description_es":"El Press de Banca con Barra es un ejercicio compuesto de empuje para el tren superior que trabaja principalmente el pectoral mayor, los deltoides anteriores y los tríceps. Acuéstate boca arriba en un banco plano con los pies firmemente apoyados en el suelo. Agarra la barra con un agarre en pronación ligeramente más ancho que la anchura de los hombros. Baja la barra hacia la base del pecho, manteniendo los codos pegados al cuerpo. Empuja la barra alejándola del cuerpo hasta que los brazos estén completamente extendidos. Esto completa una repetición.","description_en":"The Barbell Bench Press is an upper body compound pushing exercise that targets the pectoralis major, anterior deltoids, and triceps. Lie supine on a flat bench with feet firmly planted on the ground. Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width apart with an overhand grip. Unrack the bar and lower it towards the base of your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in. Press the bar away from your body until your arms are fully extended. This completes one repetition.","category":"Push","muscle_group":"Pectorales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_ejI1Nlsul9k_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Barbell_Bench_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_ejI1Nlsul9k_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejI1Nlsul9k","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"Push_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_MmjM11GJPAM","name_es":"Press de Empuje (Push Press)","name_en":"Push Press","aliases":{},"description_es":"Párate con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra a la altura de los hombros. Empuja la barra por encima de la cabeza, utilizando un ligero impulso de las rodillas y las caderas para generar momento. Baja la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial de manera controlada.","description_en":"Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder level. Press the barbell overhead, using a slight knee and hip drive to generate momentum. Lower the barbell back to the starting position in a controlled motion.","category":"Push","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Push_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_MmjM11GJPAM_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Push_Press_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_MmjM11GJPAM_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MmjM11GJPAM","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_eluOhtYkm-0","name_es":"Extensión de tríceps con barra EZ (EZ Bar Skull Crusher)","name_en":"EZ Bar Skull Crusher","aliases":{},"description_es":"Acuéstate en un banco plano sosteniendo una barra EZ con un agarre en pronación, con los brazos extendidos sobre la cabeza. Manteniendo los brazos superiores estacionarios, baja la barra hacia la parte posterior de tu cabeza flexionando los codos. Haz una pausa breve, luego extiende los brazos de vuelta a la posición inicial, contrayendo tus tríceps.","description_en":"Lie on a flat bench holding an EZ bar with an overhand grip, arms extended overhead. Keeping your upper arms stationary, lower the bar towards the back of your head by bending at the elbows. Pause briefly, then extend your arms back to the starting position, contracting your triceps.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Tríceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Aislado","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_eluOhtYkm-0_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_eluOhtYkm-0_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eluOhtYkm-0","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"id":"Landmine_Rear_Delt_Fly_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_EAS-WZ5597g","name_es":"Vuelo posterior de deltoides con landmine (Landmine Rear Delt Fly)","name_en":"Landmine Rear Delt Fly","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza el vuelo posterior de deltoides con landmine con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros, las caderas flexionadas en un ángulo de 45 grados, sosteniendo una barra con una mano con un agarre en pronación. Contrae tus dorsales rotando externamente el hombro, llevando el brazo hacia afuera hasta una posición extendida. Baja lentamente la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial. Esta es una repetición.","description_en":"Start the Landmine Rear Delt Fly with your feet shoulder-width apart, hips bent at a 45-degree angle, holding a barbell in one hand with an overhand grip. Engage your lats by externally rotating your shoulder, driving your arm outward to an extended position. Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position. This is one repetition.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Transversal","exercise_type":"Aislado","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Landmine_Rear_Delt_Fly_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_EAS-WZ5597g_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Landmine_Rear_Delt_Fly_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_EAS-WZ5597g_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EAS-WZ5597g","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"12-15","rest":60},{"id":"Seated_EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_lCr5o4qbNuM","name_es":"Extensión de tríceps sentado con barra EZ (Seated EZ Bar Skull Crusher)","name_en":"Seated EZ Bar Skull Crusher","aliases":{},"description_es":"Siéntate en el extremo de un banco sosteniendo una barra EZ con un agarre en pronación sobre tu cabeza. Mantén tus codos estacionarios y baja la barra detrás de tu cabeza flexionando los codos. Usa tus tríceps para extender tus brazos y regresar la barra a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Sit on the end of a bench holding an EZ bar with an overhand grip over your head. Keep your elbows stationary and lower the bar behind your head by bending at the elbows. Use your triceps to extend your arms and return the bar to the starting position.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Tríceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Aislado","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Seated_EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_lCr5o4qbNuM_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Seated_EZ_Bar_Skull_Crusher_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_lCr5o4qbNuM_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lCr5o4qbNuM","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"id":"Incline_Push_Up_on_Bench_E--Ls5QtFqI","name_es":"Lagartijas en plano inclinado sobre banca (Incline Push Up on Bench)","name_en":"Incline Push Up on Bench","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza en una posición de lagartijas con las manos sobre una superficie elevada, como una banca o escalón. Mantén tu cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones y baja tu pecho hacia la superficie flexionando los codos. Empuja hacia arriba hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos.","description_en":"Start in a push-up position with your hands on an elevated surface, such as a bench or step. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, and lower your chest towards the surface by bending your elbows. Push back up until your arms are fully extended.","category":"Push","muscle_group":"Pectorales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Incline_Push_Up_on_Bench_E--Ls5QtFqI_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Incline_Push_Up_on_Bench_E--Ls5QtFqI_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E--Ls5QtFqI","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":2,"reps":"12-15","rest":60},{"id":"Shoulder_to_Overhead_-_OPEX_Exercise_library_t4tyWzWU7ag","name_es":"Hombro a Overhead (Hombro a Brazos Arriba)","name_en":"Shoulder to Overhead","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza con una barra en la posición de rack frontal, con los pies a la anchura de los hombros. Rompe desde las caderas con una ligera flexión, luego impulsa la barra desde los hombros extendiendo las caderas y las piernas. Empuja debajo de la barra hasta una posición bloqueada por encima de la cabeza, de pie con la barra completamente extendida sobre la cabeza.","description_en":"Start with a barbell in the front rack position, feet shoulder-width apart. Break at the hips with a slight dip, then drive the bar off the shoulders by extending the hips and legs. Punch underneath the bar to a locked-out overhead position, standing with the barbell fully extended overhead.","category":"Push","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Shoulder_to_Overhead_-_OPEX_Exercise_library_t4tyWzWU7ag_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Shoulder_to_Overhead_-_OPEX_Exercise_library_t4tyWzWU7ag_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t4tyWzWU7ag","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"Half_Kneeling_Landmine_Mixed_Rack_Press_ylHYTd-9Ly0","name_es":"Press de Rack Mixto con Landmine en Posición de Media Rodilla (Half Kneeling Landmine Mixed Rack Press)","name_en":"Half Kneeling Landmine Mixed Rack Press","aliases":{},"description_es":"Realiza este ejercicio desde una posición de media rodilla con una barra en un accesorio de landmine. Sostén una kettlebell en una posición de rack frontal del mismo lado que tu pierna adelantada. Agarra la barra con la mano opuesta y presiónala por encima de la cabeza, bloqueando tu brazo.","description_en":"Perform this exercise from a half-kneeling position with a barbell in a landmine attachment. Hold a kettlebell in a front rack position on the same side as your forward leg. Grab the barbell with the opposite hand and press it overhead, locking out your arm.","category":"Push","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Push","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Half_Kneeling_Landmine_Mixed_Rack_Press_ylHYTd-9Ly0_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Half_Kneeling_Landmine_Mixed_Rack_Press_ylHYTd-9Ly0_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ylHYTd-9Ly0","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60}]},{"name":"Sesión 2","items":[{"id":"Barbell_Windshield_Wipers_gvxlTrF04oI","name_es":"Limpiaparabrisas con barra (Barbell Windshield Wipers)","name_en":"Barbell Windshield Wipers","aliases":{},"description_es":"Un ejercicio de core que implica girar el torso de un lado a otro mientras se sostiene una barra con los brazos extendidos frente al cuerpo.","description_en":"A core exercise that involves twisting the torso from side to side while holding a barbell in front of the body with extended arms.","category":"Core","muscle_group":"Oblicuos","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Rotation","plane_of_motion":"Transversal","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Barbell_Windshield_Wipers_gvxlTrF04oI_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Barbell_Windshield_Wipers_gvxlTrF04oI_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gvxlTrF04oI","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"Deadlift_to_Knee_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_AUoQsclQQow","name_es":"Peso muerto hasta la rodilla (Deadlift to Knee)","name_en":"Deadlift to Knee","aliases":{},"description_es":"El Peso muerto hasta la rodilla es una variación del ejercicio de Peso muerto convencional donde levantas la barra desde el suelo hasta la altura de las rodillas, manteniendo el núcleo apretado y contrayendo los glúteos durante todo el movimiento. Este rango de movimiento parcial enfatiza los músculos de la cadena posterior mientras reduce el estrés general en la espalda baja.","description_en":"The Deadlift to Knee is a variation of the conventional Deadlift exercise where you lift the barbell from the ground until it reaches knee level, keeping your core tight and squeezing your glutes throughout the movement. This partial range of motion targets the posterior chain muscles while reducing the overall stress on the lower back.","category":"Bend","muscle_group":"Dorsales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Hinge","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Deadlift_to_Knee_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_AUoQsclQQow_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Deadlift_to_Knee_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_AUoQsclQQow_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUoQsclQQow","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"6-8","rest":90},{"id":"Bent_Over_Barbell_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_9Gf-Ourup_k","name_es":"Remo con barra inclinado (Bent Over Barbell Row)","name_en":"Bent Over Barbell Row","aliases":{},"description_es":"Inicia el Remo con barra inclinado con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros mientras sostienes una barra con un agarre en pronación. Inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas manteniendo la espalda recta hasta que tu torso esté aproximadamente paralelo al suelo. Contrayendo tus dorsales, jala la barra hacia tu esternón, luego bájala lentamente a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Start the Bent Over Barbell Row with your feet shoulder-width apart while holding a barbell using an overhand grip. Bend forward at the hips while keeping your back straight until your torso is roughly parallel to the floor. Contracting your lats, pull the bar towards your sternum, then slowly lower it to the starting position.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Dorsales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Bent_Over_Barbell_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_9Gf-Ourup_k_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Bent_Over_Barbell_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_9Gf-Ourup_k_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9Gf-Ourup_k","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"Banded_Pendlay_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_t7AwNxr_1vg","name_es":"Remo Pendlay con Banda (Banded Pendlay Row)","name_en":"Banded Pendlay Row","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros, inclínate desde las caderas con el torso perpendicular al suelo. Sostén una barra con las manos y una banda atada a la barra y debajo de tus pies. Realiza un remo elevando la barra hasta la posición superior y luego regrésala a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Start with feet shoulder-width apart, hinge at the hips with your torso perpendicular to the ground. Hold a barbell in your hands with a band attached to the barbell and underneath your feet. Row the barbell up to the top position, then return it to the starting position.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Dorsales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Banded_Pendlay_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_t7AwNxr_1vg_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Banded_Pendlay_Row_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_t7AwNxr_1vg_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t7AwNxr_1vg","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":60},{"id":"EZ_Bar_Curl_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_-gSM-kqNlUw","name_es":"Curl de Barra EZ (EZ Bar Curl)","name_en":"EZ Bar Curl","aliases":{},"description_es":"De pie, sujeta una barra EZ con un agarre de manos pronadas y los brazos extendidos. Manteniendo el torso recto, realiza un curl de la barra hacia los hombros flexionando los codos. Baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Stand holding an EZ bar with an underhand grip, arms extended. Keeping your torso straight, curl the bar up towards your shoulders by bending your elbows. Slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Bíceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Aislado","functional":false,"difficulty":"Principiante","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/EZ_Bar_Curl_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_-gSM-kqNlUw_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/EZ_Bar_Curl_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_-gSM-kqNlUw_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-gSM-kqNlUw","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"id":"Seated_EZ_Bar_Reverse_Curl_OB10w0UOt40","name_es":"Curl reverso con barra EZ sentado","name_en":"Seated EZ Bar Reverse Curl","aliases":{},"description_es":"Siéntate en un banco en una posición de 90 grados. Sujeta la barra EZ en tu regazo con un agarre reverso, las palmas hacia abajo. Realiza un curl elevando la barra hacia tu mentón, luego bájala de vuelta hacia tus piernas.","description_en":"Sit on a bench in a 90-degree position. Hold the EZ bar on your lap with a reverse grip, palms facing down. Curl the bar up towards your chin, then lower it back down to your legs.","category":"Pull","muscle_group":"Bíceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Pull","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Aislado","functional":false,"difficulty":"Principiante","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Seated_EZ_Bar_Reverse_Curl_OB10w0UOt40_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Pull/Seated_EZ_Bar_Reverse_Curl_OB10w0UOt40_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OB10w0UOt40","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"isGroup":true,"children":[{"index":12,"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60,"id":"Supinated_Hanging_Knee_Tuck_7ZoMSHv4tF4","name_es":"Elevación de rodillas colgante con agarre supinado (Supinated Hanging Knee Tuck)","muscle_group":"Core","equipment_type":"Barra","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Supinated_Hanging_Knee_Tuck_7ZoMSHv4tF4_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Supinated_Hanging_Knee_Tuck_7ZoMSHv4tF4_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7ZoMSHv4tF4"},{"index":30,"sets":3,"reps":"30-60s","rest":60,"id":"Single_Arm_Overhead_Carry_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_5zj1pBRvggQ","name_es":"Caminata con Peso Sobre Cabeza con un Brazo (Single Arm Overhead Carry)","muscle_group":"Core","equipment_type":"Barra","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Single_Arm_Overhead_Carry_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_5zj1pBRvggQ_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Single_Arm_Overhead_Carry_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_5zj1pBRvggQ_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5zj1pBRvggQ"}]}]},{"name":"Sesión 3","items":[{"id":"Back_Squat_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_j-KDHkRMer0","name_es":"Sentadilla con Barra (Back Squat)","name_en":"Back Squat","aliases":{},"description_es":"La Sentadilla con Barra es un ejercicio compuesto que comienza en posición de pie con una barra colocada en la parte superior de la espalda y los hombros. El cliente se flexiona desde las caderas y baja las caderas por debajo de las rodillas, manteniendo el pecho erguido y la espalda plana. Luego, regresa a la posición inicial empujando a través de los talones y extendiendo las caderas y las rodillas.","description_en":"The Back Squat is a compound exercise that starts in a standing position with a barbell placed across the upper back and shoulders. The client breaks at the hips and lowers their hips below the knees while keeping the chest upright and the back flat. They then return to the starting position by driving through the heels and extending the hips and knees.","category":"Squat","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Squat","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Back_Squat_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_j-KDHkRMer0_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Back_Squat_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_j-KDHkRMer0_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j-KDHkRMer0","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90},{"id":"Zercher_Reverse_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_VOpO2BjcJSU","name_es":"Zancada Reversa Zercher (Zercher Reverse Lunge)","name_en":"Zercher Reverse Lunge","aliases":{},"description_es":"Inicia la Zancada Reversa Zercher con una barra sostenida en la posición zercher, con la barra descansando en los pliegues de los codos. Comienza con ambos pies debajo de las caderas, da un paso hacia atrás bajando hasta que la rodilla trasera toque el suelo, luego regresa a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Start the Zercher Reverse Lunge with a barbell held in the zercher position, with the barbell resting in the crooks of the elbows. Start with both feet underneath the hips, take a reverse step lowering until the back knee touches the floor, then return to the starting position.","category":"Lunge","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Squat","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Zercher_Reverse_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_VOpO2BjcJSU_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Zercher_Reverse_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_VOpO2BjcJSU_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VOpO2BjcJSU","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90},{"id":"Landmine_Reverse_Lunge_jnOljeWtimQ","name_es":"Zancada Reversa con Landmine (Landmine Reverse Lunge)","name_en":"Landmine Reverse Lunge","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza con la barra en el accesorio landmine y colócate perpendicular a la barra. Sujeta la barra con la mano más cercana a ella. Da un paso hacia atrás con el pie del mismo lado que la barra y baja la rodilla hasta el suelo. Impulsa de vuelta a la posición de pie.","description_en":"Start with the barbell in the landmine attachment and stand perpendicular to the bar. Hold the barbell with the hand closest to it. Step back with the foot on the same side as the barbell and lower your knee to the ground. Drive back up to the standing position.","category":"Lunge","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Squat","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Landmine_Reverse_Lunge_jnOljeWtimQ_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Landmine_Reverse_Lunge_jnOljeWtimQ_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jnOljeWtimQ","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90},{"id":"Shoulders_Elevated_Barbell_Hip_Thrust_JVe0AjERVsE","name_es":"Elevación de hombros con barra para empuje de cadera (Shoulders Elevated Barbell Hip Thrust)","name_en":"Shoulders Elevated Barbell Hip Thrust","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza con los hombros sobre un banco, las caderas en el suelo y ambos pies apoyados. Coloca una barra sobre tus caderas. Utilizando tus glúteos, empuja hacia arriba hasta quedar paralelo al suelo. Luego, regresa a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Start with your shoulders on a bench, bottom on the floor, and both feet on the ground. Place a barbell across your hips. Using your glutes, push through your bottom until you are parallel to the floor. Then return to the starting position.","category":"Bend","muscle_group":"Glúteos","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Hinge","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Shoulders_Elevated_Barbell_Hip_Thrust_JVe0AjERVsE_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Shoulders_Elevated_Barbell_Hip_Thrust_JVe0AjERVsE_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JVe0AjERVsE","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"id":"Romanian_Deadlift_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bT5OOBgY4bc","name_es":"Peso muerto rumano (Romanian Deadlift)","name_en":"Romanian Deadlift","aliases":{},"description_es":"El peso muerto rumano es una variación del peso muerto convencional dominada por la cadera que mantiene la rigidez en las rodillas. Comienza con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra con ambas manos. Manteniendo una columna recta, aprieta los glúteos y extiende hasta una posición de pie. Luego, haz una flexión en las caderas, bajando la barra hacia el suelo mientras mantienes las piernas rectas. Regresa a la posición inicial. Esta es una repetición.","description_en":"The Romanian Deadlift is a hip-dominant variation of the conventional deadlift that maintains rigidity in the knees. Start with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell with both hands. Keeping a straight spine, squeeze your glutes and extend to a standing position. Then hinge at the hips, lowering the barbell towards the floor while maintaining straight legs. Return to the starting position. This is one repetition.","category":"Bend","muscle_group":"Isquiotibiales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Hinge","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Romanian_Deadlift_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bT5OOBgY4bc_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Romanian_Deadlift_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bT5OOBgY4bc_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bT5OOBgY4bc","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90},{"id":"Elevated_Hip_Thrust_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_nx0WOzIcqV0","name_es":"Elevación de Cadera (Elevated Hip Thrust)","name_en":"Elevated Hip Thrust","aliases":{},"description_es":"Acuéstate boca arriba con los hombros en el suelo y los talones sobre un banco o superficie elevada. Manteniendo tu cuerpo en línea recta, empuja a través de tus talones para elevar las caderas hasta que tu cuerpo forme una línea recta desde las rodillas hasta los hombros. Mantén la posición superior, apretando los glúteos, luego baja de nuevo.","description_en":"Lie on your back with your shoulders on the floor and your heels on a bench or elevated surface. Keeping your body in a straight line, drive through your heels to raise your hips until your body forms a straight line from knees to shoulders. Hold the top position, squeezing your glutes, then lower back down.","category":"Bend","muscle_group":"Glúteos","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Hinge","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Elevated_Hip_Thrust_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_nx0WOzIcqV0_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Elevated_Hip_Thrust_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_nx0WOzIcqV0_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nx0WOzIcqV0","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"10-15","rest":60},{"id":"Good_Morning_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2k5W4PTlCDw","name_es":"Buenos Días (Good Morning)","name_en":"Good Morning","aliases":{},"description_es":"Párate con los pies a la anchura de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra cruzada sobre la parte posterior de los hombros. Manteniendo la espalda recta y el núcleo activado, flexiona desde las caderas, bajando el torso hasta que esté casi paralelo al suelo. Haz una pausa, luego revierte el movimiento empujando las caderas hacia adelante y regresando a la posición inicial.","description_en":"Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across the back of your shoulders. Keeping your back straight and core engaged, hinge forward at the hips, lowering your torso until it's nearly parallel to the floor. Pause, then reverse the motion by driving your hips forward and returning to the starting position.","category":"Bend","muscle_group":"Isquiotibiales","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Hinge","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":false,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Good_Morning_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2k5W4PTlCDw_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Good_Morning_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_2k5W4PTlCDw_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2k5W4PTlCDw","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90},{"id":"Barbell_Walking_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bdbJ_aRjw-4","name_es":"Zancada caminando con barra (Barbell Walking Lunge)","name_en":"Barbell Walking Lunge","aliases":{},"description_es":"Comienza de pie con una barra colocada sobre la parte posterior de los hombros. Da un paso hacia adelante con una pierna y baja el cuerpo hasta que ambas rodillas formen ángulos de 90 grados. Empuja hacia atrás a la posición inicial y repite con la pierna opuesta.","description_en":"Start in a standing position with a barbell held across the back of your shoulders. Step forward with one leg and lower your body until both knees form 90-degree angles. Push back to the starting position and repeat with the opposite leg.","category":"Squat","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":{},"movement_pattern":"Squat","plane_of_motion":"Sagital","exercise_type":"Compuesto","functional":true,"difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Barbell_Walking_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bdbJ_aRjw-4_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Barbell_Walking_Lunge_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_bdbJ_aRjw-4_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bdbJ_aRjw-4","tips":{},"common_mistakes":{},"sets":3,"reps":"8-12","rest":90}]}]

plans.name: Plan de Julio Gutierrez Morales
plans.sessions: [{"id":1,"name":"Sesión 1","items":[{"id":"1767939462033","name_en":"Swiss Ball Deadbug","name_es":"Bicho muerto con pelota suiza (Swiss Ball Deadbug)","category":"Core","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","equipment_specific":"Pelota suiza","muscle_group":"Core","secondary_muscles":[],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Core","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Transversal","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Lie on your back with your arms extended overhead and legs raised, balancing a dumbbell on your shins. Keeping your arms and legs straight, alternately lower your right arm and left leg towards the floor, then return to the starting position. Repeat on the opposite side.","description_es":"Acuéstate boca arriba con los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza y las piernas levantadas, equilibrando una mancuerna sobre las espinillas. Manteniendo los brazos y las piernas rectos, baja alternativamente el brazo derecho y la pierna izquierda hacia el suelo, luego regresa a la posición inicial. Repite del lado opuesto.","aliases":[],"tips":[],"common_mistakes":[],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Swiss_Ball_Deadbug_IZE8woIduAU_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Core/Swiss_Ball_Deadbug_IZE8woIduAU_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IZE8woIduAU","gif_url":null,"name":"Bicho muerto con pelota suiza (Swiss Ball Deadbug)","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767716479817","name_en":"Behind the Neck Thruster","name_es":"Thruster por detrás del cuello (Behind the Neck Thruster)","category":"Push","difficulty":"Avanzado","equipment_type":"Barra","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":[],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Begin with the barbell positioned on your back in a high-bar back squat setup. Squat down until your thighs are parallel to the ground. Then, explosively drive through your heels to stand up while simultaneously pressing the barbell overhead until your arms are fully extended.","description_es":"Comienza con la barra posicionada en tu espalda en una posición de sentadilla con agarre alto. Baja hasta que tus muslos estén paralelos al suelo. Luego, empuja explosivamente a través de tus talones para ponerte de pie mientras simultáneamente presionas la barra por encima de tu cabeza hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos.","aliases":[],"tips":[],"common_mistakes":[],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Behind_the_Neck_Thruster_hdmK6RfXJg8_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://i.ytimg.com/vi_webp/hdmK6RfXJg8/maxresdefault.webp","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hdmK6RfXJg8","gif_url":null,"name":"Thruster por detrás del cuello (Behind the Neck Thruster)","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false}]},{"id":2,"name":"Sesión 2","items":[{"id":"1767939481601","name_en":"Posterior Box Step Down","name_es":"Paso hacia atrás desde caja (Posterior Box Step Down)","category":"Lunge","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Otro","equipment_specific":"Caja o escalón","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":["Gemelos","Glúteos","Isquiotibiales"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Squat","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"A lunge variation where the trailing leg steps down from an elevated surface, such as a box or step, emphasizing the eccentric contraction of the quadriceps and glutes.","description_es":"Una variación de zancada donde la pierna trasera baja desde una superficie elevada, como una caja o escalón, enfatizando la contracción excéntrica de los cuádriceps y glúteos.","aliases":["Reverse Box Step Down","Reverse Step Down"],"tips":["Aterriza suavemente con el talón delantero","Desciende de forma controlada","Mantén el tronco erguido"],"common_mistakes":["Falta de control en la fase excéntrica","Inclinación excesiva del tronco","Rodilla delantera sobrepasando la punta del pie"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Posterior_Box_Step_Down_B2GEmrklpAo_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Lunge/Posterior_Box_Step_Down_B2GEmrklpAo_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B2GEmrklpAo","gif_url":null,"name":"Paso hacia atrás desde caja (Posterior Box Step Down)","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767939483288","name":"Superserie","sets":0,"reps":0,"rest":0,"isGroup":true,"children":[{"id":"1767939475912","name_en":"Deadlift to Knee","name_es":"Peso muerto hasta la rodilla (Deadlift to Knee)","category":"Bend","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Barra","muscle_group":"Dorsales","secondary_muscles":["Antebrazos","Cuádriceps","Glúteos","Isquiotibiales","Trapecios"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Hinge","functional":false,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"The Deadlift to Knee is a variation of the conventional Deadlift exercise where you lift the barbell from the ground until it reaches knee level, keeping your core tight and squeezing your glutes throughout the movement. This partial range of motion targets the posterior chain muscles while reducing the overall stress on the lower back.","description_es":"El Peso muerto hasta la rodilla es una variación del ejercicio de Peso muerto convencional donde levantas la barra desde el suelo hasta la altura de las rodillas, manteniendo el núcleo apretado y contrayendo los glúteos durante todo el movimiento. Este rango de movimiento parcial enfatiza los músculos de la cadena posterior mientras reduce el estrés general en la espalda baja.","aliases":["Deadlift parcial","Partial Deadlift"],"tips":["Empuja con los talones y contrae los glúteos al levantar","Mantén la barra cerca del cuerpo durante todo el movimiento","Respira profundamente y mantén el núcleo apretado"],"common_mistakes":["Arquear la espalda","Levantar con las piernas en lugar de empujar con los talones","Mirar hacia arriba en lugar de mantener una postura neutral"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Deadlift_to_Knee_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_AUoQsclQQow_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Bend/Deadlift_to_Knee_-_OPEX_Exercise_Library_AUoQsclQQow_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AUoQsclQQow","gif_url":null,"name":"Peso muerto hasta la rodilla (Deadlift to Knee)","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767939463353","name_en":"Parallette Kipping Deficit Handstand Push Up","name_es":"Hand Stand Push Up con déficit en paralelas","category":"Push","difficulty":"Avanzado","equipment_type":"Peso corporal","equipment_specific":"Paralelas","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":[],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Start in a handstand position with your hands on the parallettes, facing away from the wall. Lower yourself until your head touches the ground. Then, bend your legs and kick them straight, locking them out as you push yourself back up to the handstand position with straight legs.","description_es":"Comienza en posición vertical con las manos sobre las paralelas, de espaldas a la pared. Baja hasta que tu cabeza toque el suelo. Luego, dobla las piernas y pátales hacia arriba, extendiéndolas mientras te empujas de vuelta a la posición vertical con las piernas rectas.","aliases":[],"tips":[],"common_mistakes":[],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Parallette_Kipping_Deficit_Handstand_Push_Up_DpDiS9QEK4Y_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Parallette_Kipping_Deficit_Handstand_Push_Up_DpDiS9QEK4Y_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpDiS9QEK4Y","gif_url":null,"name":"Hand Stand Push Up con déficit en paralelas","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false}]}]},{"id":3,"name":"Sesión 3","items":[{"id":"1767939472663","name":"Superserie","sets":0,"reps":0,"rest":0,"isGroup":true,"children":[{"id":"1767716483929","name_en":"Parallette Kipping Deficit Handstand Push Up","name_es":"Hand Stand Push Up con déficit en paralelas","category":"Push","difficulty":"Avanzado","equipment_type":"Peso corporal","equipment_specific":"Paralelas","muscle_group":"Deltoides","secondary_muscles":[],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Push","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Start in a handstand position with your hands on the parallettes, facing away from the wall. Lower yourself until your head touches the ground. Then, bend your legs and kick them straight, locking them out as you push yourself back up to the handstand position with straight legs.","description_es":"Comienza en posición vertical con las manos sobre las paralelas, de espaldas a la pared. Baja hasta que tu cabeza toque el suelo. Luego, dobla las piernas y pátales hacia arriba, extendiéndolas mientras te empujas de vuelta a la posición vertical con las piernas rectas.","aliases":[],"tips":[],"common_mistakes":[],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Parallette_Kipping_Deficit_Handstand_Push_Up_DpDiS9QEK4Y_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Push/Parallette_Kipping_Deficit_Handstand_Push_Up_DpDiS9QEK4Y_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DpDiS9QEK4Y","gif_url":null,"name":"Hand Stand Push Up con déficit en paralelas","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767716485793","name_en":"Box Drop Into Squat","name_es":"Salto desde caja a sentadilla (Box Drop Into Squat)","category":"Squat","difficulty":"Intermedio","equipment_type":"Otro","equipment_specific":"Caja de salto","muscle_group":"Cuádriceps","secondary_muscles":["Abdominales","Gemelos","Glúteos","Isquiotibiales"],"exercise_type":"Compuesto","movement_pattern":"Squat","functional":true,"plane_of_motion":"Sagital","training_goal":"Fuerza","description_en":"Start standing on a box. Jump off the box and as you land, drop into a squat position. Then, drive back up to a standing position.","description_es":"Comienza de pie sobre una caja. Salta desde la caja y al aterrizar, desciende a una posición de sentadilla. Luego, impulsa hacia arriba para volver a la posición de pie.","aliases":["Box Jump Squat","Squat Jump Off Box"],"tips":["Aterriza con los pies separados a la anchura de los hombros","Desciende controlando el movimiento","Mantén la espalda recta"],"common_mistakes":["Aterrizaje incorrecto","Falta de profundidad en la sentadilla","Mala postura"],"preview_url":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Box_Drop_Into_Squat_bnGaAuCamVU_preview.mp4","thumbnail":"https://exercise-videos-fitness-planner.s3.amazonaws.com/previews/Squat/Box_Drop_Into_Squat_bnGaAuCamVU_thumb.0000000.jpg","youtube_url":"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bnGaAuCamVU","gif_url":null,"name":"Salto desde caja a sentadilla (Box Drop Into Squat)","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false}]}]},{"id":4,"name":"Sesión 4","items":[{"id":"1767939582711","name":"Thruster por detrás del cuello (Behind the Neck Thruster)","name_es":"Thruster por detrás del cuello (Behind the Neck Thruster)","equipment_type":"Barra","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767939581079","name":"Bicho muerto con pelota suiza (Swiss Ball Deadbug)","name_es":"Bicho muerto con pelota suiza (Swiss Ball Deadbug)","equipment_type":"Mancuernas","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false},{"id":"1767939579144","name":"Salto desde caja a sentadilla (Box Drop Into Squat)","name_es":"Salto desde caja a sentadilla (Box Drop Into Squat)","equipment_type":"Otro","sets":3,"reps":10,"rest":60,"selected":false,"isGroup":false}]}]
